*You shout "Za Hando!" and summon your Stand. Za Hando looked at you, a bit confused. She put her finger to her chin, tilting her head and looking around*

"Err, Master?" *She asked.* "Why did you summon me? Oh Oh! You just wanted to hang out, right? Cool." *She smiled wide, scratching her ass a bit. She...wasn't the brightest.*
